entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
